snippet: Gunmen on Monday kidnapped a European oil employee in Sana, the capital, hours after the city was rocked by overnight explosions, the second abduction of a Westerner in four days.
lead_paragraph: Gunmen on Monday kidnapped a European oil employee in Sana, the capital, hours after the city was rocked by overnight explosions, the second abduction of a Westerner in four days.

headline.main: Yemen: Western Employee of Oil Company Kidnapped
headline.print_headline: Yemen: Western Employee of Oil Company Kidnapped
